welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Mainburg, known for its picturesque landscapes and historic architecture. We invite you to soak in the beauty of our city and immerse yourself in its rich culture and traditions. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Mainburg has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ingolstadt-manching Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ingolstadt-manching Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Franz Josef Strauss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal mainly used by Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.
